You\'re ready to enter the Starfleet Academy! Later you\'ll probably be assigned to a starship to explore strange new worlds, searching other life forms and new civilization, to boldly go where no man has gone before.

Long time ago, in a galaxy far far away you probably would\'ve become a Jedi master or a powerful Sith. Those times are ended now, everything\'s changed, the future is still to be writtenâ€¦.may the force be with you!
You\'re an explorer and eager to learn about other cultures. The problem is you cannot hide your scoundrel attitude, thus you\'ve enemies and lovers in every harbour... ergh, planet!

If you suddenly find yourself in another universe, what will you do?
Go explore strange new worlds, to seek out new life and civilization.
Build a new galactic empire.
Go planet hopping and immerse myself in different alien culture.
Not all lifeforms are friendly. Choose your weapon:
My mind is my weapon.
An elegant weapon for a more civilized age.
Anything that goes \"pewpew\" is fine with me.
What type of student were you?
Dedicated and studious, in your own skill dome.
You didn\'t have time to study. You always had to go to Tosche station.
Rebellious and outgoing, you crashed in every party.
You receive a red shirt from a friend:
You start making your will.
I love it, it really goes well with another dress I used in a more formal occasion.
I prefer other colors, like blue or brown...
What do you absolutely need on your spaceship?
A warp core.
Front mandibles, freight elevator, missile launcher and quad laser cannon.
A higly logical and clever being that will help you save the day.
How do you use your phaser?
I set it to stunn.
I shoot first.
I use it only if there are no other ways.
When you\'re in love:
It\'s a complete madness, I hardly recognize my friends and family.
I know.
I barely fall in love and most of the time is platonic.
